Sender Backend API

GET /device/info

Read device information from a JSON file

Status Codes:

  • 200 OK – Successful response with device information

  • 500 Internal Server Error – Internal server error

POST /device/link

Link the rshake device to a registered account in earthquake-hub network

Status Codes:

  • 200 OK – Successful response with device information

  • 400 Bad Request – Error from earthquake-hub

  • 401 Unauthorized – Invalid inputs

  • 500 Internal Server Error – Internal server error

GET /servers/getList

Read list of servers saved in a JSON file

Status Codes:

  • 200 OK – Successful response with array of ringservers

  • 500 Internal Server Error – Error reading servers.json

POST /servers/add

Add a ringserver to the list

Status Codes:

  • 200 OK – Successful response

  • 400 Bad Request – Input validation error

  • 401 Unauthorized – Server input is already saved

  • 500 Internal Server Error – Internal server error

POST /stream/start

Start slink2dali streaming to specified servers in the local file store

Status Codes:

  • 200 OK – Successful spawning of slink2dali

  • 400 Bad Request – Ringserver url is not saved to local file store

  • 401 Unauthorized – Device is already streaming to the specified ringserver url

  • 500 Internal Server Error – Internal server error

GET /stream/status

Get streaming status to each server

Status Codes:

  • 200 OK – Successful response
